title: DJ Sona #much needed Sona love Thank you Rito.
body: {{champion:37}}  OMG. Riot for this short time I love you. I've said that you should have made this skin for year or so and called it you did. Much love Riot much love. Now all you need to do is undo the nerf. But really Riot good on ya great job.

replies.body:
> Now all you need to do is undo the nerf.

Been playing Sona all day to practice for DJ Sona. I keep up in damage with the rest of my team, I get off more healing any anybody else in the game providing more healing than some people do damage, and out of 6 games I won 4 with the other 2 both being pretty close games.

Is it really that much love when they ask you to pay 30 bucks for it?  :P

It looks seriously amazing, but man I hate the idea of a skin that costs more than many entire games do.
